name: M. Diane KOKEN, Insurance Commissioner, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, v. LEGION INSURANCE COMPANY. Appeal of John Hancock Insurance Company, Participant

parties: M. Diane KOKEN, Insurance Commissioner, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, v. LEGION INSURANCE COMPANY. Appeal of John Hancock Insurance Company, Participant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of August, 2002, the above-captioned appeal is quashed as a non-appealable interlocutory order.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
811 A.2d 974
M. Diane KOKEN, Insurance Commissioner, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, v. LEGION INSURANCE COMPANY. Appeal of John Hancock Insurance Company, Participant.
No. 87 MAP 2002.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 29, 2002.
